name: One touch
description:
One touch is a platformer-strategy-puzzle game needed of strategy and skill.
Despite being a strategy game, and needing some skill, it is a very refreshing and ejoyable game, made for both casual and advanced players.

How to play:

To start, you have to touch a node, and you have to conect all the dots using the drawed lines, but you cant pass the same path twice, that means you can't repeat the same path.

What to expect:

-A lot of levels, which result in a lot of gameplay hours

-Good visual effects-

-Minimalist aesthetic.


Controls:

-Use mouse to move in the menu and to conect dots.
